revised_title: Pure Cultures of Uredine and Host-Parasite Relations in Bromus and Puccinia dispersa
tldr: The author describes a method for obtaining pure cultures of a uredine, Puccinia dispersa, and its host plant, Bromus. They discuss the physics and physiology of protoplasmic streaming in plants and the interpretation of photographic records of nerve response using the capillary electrometer.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
